nodes.text: John William DiMaggio (born September 4, 1968) provided the voice of General Grievous and Sha'a Gi for Chapter 20 of the Star Wars: Clone Wars cartoon. He is perhaps best known for being the voice of the robot Bender on the TV show Futurama. DiMaggio also voiced the bounty hunter Baash in the 2016–2017 television LEGO Star Wars: The Freemaker Adventures. He and his co-star Danny Jacobs, who voiced Raam, also appeared as guests on The Star Wars Show on September 20, 2017.
He has been married to actress Kate Miller since October 2014.
